00059 typedef orxU32                      orxRGBA;
00060 
00061 #ifdef __orxBIG_ENDIAN__
00062 
00063   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((R) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((A) & 0xFF))
00064   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00065   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00066   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00067   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00068 
00069 #else /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00070 
00071   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((A) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((R) & 0xFF))
00072   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00073   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00074   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00075   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00076 
00077 #endif /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00078 
00079 #define orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER         (orx2F(1.0f / 255.0f))
00080 #define orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER       (orx2F(255.0f))

00266 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGBA(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxRGBA _stRGBA)
00267 {
00268   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00269 
00270   /* Checks */
00271   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00272 
00273   /* Stores RGB */
00274   orxVector_Set(&(_pstColor->vRGB), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_R(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_G(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_B(_stRGBA)));
00275 
00276   /* Stores alpha */
00277   _pstColor->fAlpha = orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxRGBA_A(_stRGBA);
00278 
00279   /* Done! */
00280   return pstResult;
00281 }
00282 
00289 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Set(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00290 {
00291   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00292 
00293   /* Checks */
00294   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00295 
00296   /* Stores RGB */
00297   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00298 
00299   /* Stores alpha */
00300   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00301 
00302   /* Done! */
00303   return pstResult;
00304 }

00311 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB)
00312 {
00313   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00314 
00315   /* Checks */
00316   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00317   orxASSERT(_pvRGB != orxNULL);
00318 
00319   /* Stores components */
00320   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00321 
00322   /* Done! */
00323   return pstResult;
00324 }

00331 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetAlpha(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00332 {
00333   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00334

00336   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);

00338   /* Stores it */
00339   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00340 
00341   /* Done! */

00344 
00349 static orxINLINE orxRGBA          orxColor_ToRGBA(const orxCOLOR *_pstColor)
00350 {
00351   orxRGBA   stResult;
00352   orxVECTOR vColor;
00353   orxFLOAT  fAlpha;
00354 
00355   /* Checks */
00356   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00357 
00358   /* Clamps RGB components */
00359   orxVector_Clamp(&vColor, &(_pstColor->vRGB), &orxVECTOR_0, &orxVECTOR_WHITE);
00360 
00361   /* De-normalizes vector */
00362   orxVector_Mulf(&vColor, &vColor, orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER);
00363 
00364   /* Clamps alpha */
00365   fAlpha = orxCLAMP(_pstColor->fAlpha, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00366 
00367   /* Updates result */
00368   stResult = orx2RGBA(orxF2U(vColor.fR), orxF2U(vColor.fG), orxF2U(vColor.fB), orxF2U(orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER * fAlpha));
00369 
00370   /* Done! */
00371   return stResult;
00372 }
00373 
00379 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Copy(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00380 {
00381   /* Checks */
00382   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00383   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00384 
00385   /* Copies it */
00386   orxMemory_Copy(_pstDst, _pstSrc, sizeof(orxCOLOR));
00387 
00388   /* Done! */
00389   return _pstDst;
00390 }

00397 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSL(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00398 {
00399   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00400   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00401 
00402   /* Checks */
00403   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00404   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00405 
00406   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00407   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00408   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00409   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00410 
00411   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00412   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00413   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00414   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00415 
00416   /* Stores lightness */
00417   pstResult->vHSL.fL = orx2F(0.5f) * (fMax + fMin);
00418 
00419   /* Gray? */
00420   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00421   {
00422     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00423     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00424   }
00425   else
00426   {
00427     /* Updates saturation */
00428     pstResult->vHSL.fS = (pstResult->vHSL.fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00429                        ? fDelta / (fMax + fMin)
00430                        : fDelta / (orx2F(2.0f) - fMax - fMin);
00431 
00432     /* Red tone? */
00433     if(fR == fMax)
00434     {
00435       /* Updates hue */
00436       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00437     }
00438     /* Green tone? */
00439     else if(fG == fMax)
00440     {
00441       /* Updates hue */
00442       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00443     }
00444     /* Blue tone */
00445     else
00446     {
00447       /* Updates hue */
00448       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00449     }
00450 
00451     /* Clamps hue */
00452     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00453     {
00454       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00455     }
00456     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00457     {
00458       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00459     }
00460   }
00461 
00462   /* Updates alpha */
00463   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00464 
00465   /* Done! */
00466   return pstResult;
00467 }
00468 
00474 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSLToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00475 {
00476   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00477   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fL;
00478 
00479 #define orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(RESULT, ALT, CHROMA, HUE)                      \
00480 do                                                                                \
00481 {                                                                                 \
00482   if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f))                                                    \
00483   {                                                                               \
00484     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * HUE * (CHROMA - ALT));                          \
00485   }                                                                               \
00486   else if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 2.0f))                                               \
00487   {                                                                               \
00488     RESULT = CHROMA;                                                              \
00489   }                                                                               \
00490   else if(HUE < orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))                                               \
00491   {                                                                               \
00492     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * (CHROMA - ALT) * (orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) - HUE));   \
00493   }                                                                               \
00494   else                                                                            \
00495   {                                                                               \
00496     RESULT = ALT;                                                                 \
00497   }                                                                               \
00498   if(RESULT < orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                                                 \
00499   {                                                                               \
00500     RESULT = orxFLOAT_0;                                                          \
00501   }                                                                               \
00502   else if(RESULT > orxFLOAT_1 - orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                               \
00503   {                                                                               \
00504     RESULT = orxFLOAT_1;                                                          \
00505   }                                                                               \
00506 }                                                                                 \
00507 while(orxFALSE)
00508 
00509   /* Checks */
00510   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00511   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00512 
00513   /* Gets source hue, saturation and lightness components */
00514   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00515   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00516   fL = _pstSrc->vRGB.fL;
00517 
00518   /* Gray? */
00519   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00520   {
00521     /* Updates result */
00522     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fL);
00523   }
00524   else
00525   {
00526     orxFLOAT fChroma, fIntermediate;
00527 
00528     /* Gets chroma */
00529     fChroma = (fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00530             ? fL + (fL * fS)
00531             : fL + fS - (fL * fS);
00532 
00533     /* Gets intermediate value */
00534     fIntermediate = (orx2F(2.0f) * fL) - fChroma;
00535 
00536     /* Gets RGB components */
00537     if(fH > orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))
00538     {
00539       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00540     }
00541     else
00542     {
00543       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00544     }
00545     orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fG, fIntermediate, fChroma, fH);
00546     if(fH < orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f))
00547     {
00548       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00549     }
00550     else
00551     {
00552       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00553     }
00554   }
00555 
00556   /* Updates alpha */
00557   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00558 
00559   /* Done! */
00560   return pstResult;
00561 }
00562 
00568 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSV(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00569 {
00570   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00571   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00572 
00573   /* Checks */
00574   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00575   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00576 
00577   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00578   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00579   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00580   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00581 
00582   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00583   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00584   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00585   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00586 
00587   /* Stores value */
00588   pstResult->vHSL.fV = fMax;
00589 
00590   /* Gray? */
00591   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00592   {
00593     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00594     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00595   }
00596   else
00597   {
00598     /* Updates saturation */
00599     pstResult->vHSL.fS = fDelta / fMax;
00600 
00601     /* Red tone? */
00602     if(fR == fMax)
00603     {
00604       /* Updates hue */
00605       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00606     }
00607     /* Green tone? */
00608     else if(fG == fMax)
00609     {
00610       /* Updates hue */
00611       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00612     }
00613     /* Blue tone */
00614     else
00615     {
00616       /* Updates hue */
00617       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00618     }
00619 
00620     /* Clamps hue */
00621     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00622     {
00623       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00624     }
00625     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00626     {
00627       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00628     }
00629   }
00630 
00631   /* Updates alpha */
00632   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00633 
00634   /* Done! */
00635   return pstResult;
00636 }
00637 
00643 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSVToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00644 {
00645   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00646   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fV;
00647 
00648   /* Checks */
00649   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00650   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00651 
00652   /* Gets source hue, saturation and value components */
00653   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00654   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00655   fV = _pstSrc->vRGB.fV;
00656 
00657   /* Gray? */
00658   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00659   {
00660     /* Updates result */
00661     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fV);
00662   }
00663   else
00664   {
00665     orxFLOAT fFullHue, fSector, fIntermediate;
00666 
00667     /* Gets intermediate value */
00668     fIntermediate = fV * fS;
00669 
00670     /* Gets full hue & sector */
00671     fFullHue  = orx2F(6.0f) * fH;
00672     fSector   = orxMath_Floor(fFullHue);
00673 
00674     /* Depending on sector */
00675     switch(orxF2U(fSector))
00676     {
00677       default:
00678       case 0:
00679       {
00680         /* Updates RGB components */
00681         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00682         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00683         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00684 
00685         break;
00686       }
00687 
00688       case 1:
00689       {
00690         /* Updates RGB components */
00691         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00692         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00693         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00694 
00695         break;
00696       }
00697 
00698       case 2:
00699       {
00700         /* Updates RGB components */
00701         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00702         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00703         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00704 
00705         break;
00706       }
00707 
00708       case 3:
00709       {
00710         /* Updates RGB components */
00711         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00712         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00713         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00714 
00715         break;
00716       }
00717 
00718       case 4:
00719       {
00720         /* Updates RGB components */
00721         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00722         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00723         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00724 
00725         break;
00726       }
00727 
00728       case 5:
00729       {
00730         /* Updates RGB components */
00731         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00732         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00733         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00734 
00735         break;
00736       }
00737     }
00738   }
00739 
00740   /* Updates alpha */
00741   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00742 
00743   /* Done! */
00744   return pstResult;
00745 }

00749  * Functions extended by plugins
00750  ***************************************************************************/
